mapper.insert: insert into tb_article ( article_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt ) values ( #{article_no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, now(), #{viewCnt} )
mapper.select: select article_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tb_article where article_no = #{article_no}
mapper.update: update tb_article set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where article_no = #{article_no}
mapper.select: select article_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tb_article where article_no > 0 order by article_no desc, regdate desc
select article_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tb_article where article_no > 0 order by article_no DESC, regdate DESC limit #{page}, 10
select article_no, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tb_article where article_no > 0 order by article_no DESC, regdate DESC limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(article_no) from tb_article where article_no > 0
